UI_visible_response: Sophia Huang Xueqin advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to support survivors of sexual harassment, including her work on anti-sexual harassment law1. She also played a significant role in promoting the #MeToo movement in China3. Additionally, she worked as an independent journalist, reporting on issues related to women's rights2.
traffic_visible_response: Sophia Huang Xueqin advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to support survivors of sexual harassment, including her work on anti-sexual harassment law [[1]]. She also played a significant role in promoting the #MeToo movement in China [[3]]. Additionally, she worked as an independent journalist, reporting on issues related to women's rights [[2]].
